title: Mother and Child Shot In La Marque Home Invasion
content:
On March 22nd, 2016 at approximately 10:55 PM Officers with the La Marque Police Department responded to a home invasion in the 300 block of Poplar.
The initial investigation has shown that the suspect in the case kicked the front door open. After kicking the door open the suspect fired one shot into the living room. This resulted in an adult female (40 years of age) being shot in the leg and a 2 year old child being struck in the hand by the bullet.
It was reported that after the gun shot was fired the male suspect fled away on foot and was wearing ski type mask.
Both gunshot victims in the case were transported to an area hospital for their injuries.
Anyone with information is being asked to make contact with the La Marque Police Department or the La Marque Crime Stoppers.
